record.id: module="rootcausetask" and status="Pending Review" and workflow="Problem Task"
record.condition: not (same(phaseName in $L.wfPhase, "Active")) or phaseName in $L.wfPhase="Active" and priority.code in $L.file<"3"
record.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentWFPhase</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase Name">phaseName</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Active</Value></condition><collection logical="OR" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentWFPhase</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase Name">phaseName</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Active</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Priority Code">priority.code</FieldName></operand><Comparison>lt</Comparison><Value dataType="">3</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
record.conditionDesc: ( Phase Name in CurrentWFPhase != "Active" OR ( Phase Name in CurrentWFPhase = "Active" AND Priority Code in CurrentRecord < "3"))
